name: Guns Shooting: Zombie Survival
description:
Can You save survivors from undead zombies horde :D ?
You don't need a hero You need guns with infinite bullets !
Try this free game,and unlock all guns from pistol to sniper rifle and clean highway from zombies

Controls:
-Move finger up or down to control the gun
-tap to fire
-Only headshot kills zombies
-Don't shoot survivors

Download now ! and have fun playing good luck

Attributions:
Enemy by Irmirx
Power ups by Osmic
Background by mind chamber
Music by sketchy logic
